data.eml:eml: Possible living fossil in Bolivia: A new genus of flea beetles with modified hind legs (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae, Alticini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Konstantinov, Alexander S. (2016): Possible living fossil in Bolivia: A new genus of flea beetles with modified hind legs (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae, Alticini). ZooKeys 592: 103-120, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.592.8180, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.592.8180
